source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_00<tab>Fukudo would have you speak to Kurobana once more.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_00<tab>ナマイ村のフクドは、冒険者に協力を依頼したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_01<tab>Fukudo thanks you for deciding to remain in Namai and help Kurobana. He has come to the conclusion that the Lupin boy might be suited to work which requires strength, but is not of an aggressive nature─specifically, transporting sacks of rice. Fukudo says he shall go inform his friend who monitors the rice storehouse of his idea and bids you talk to Kurobana.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_01<tab>フクドと話した。フクドは、クロバナに俵運びをやらせてみようと思っているのだという。ナマイ村の「クロバナ」に、このことを伝えよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_02<tab>Kurobana is initially caught off guard by Fukudo's suggestion, but he eventually agrees to transport rice if it will help the village as a whole. You follow Kurobana as he heads off to talk with Shirojishi, Fukudo's friend.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_02<tab>クロバナと話した。村の役に立てるならやらない手はないと言い、シロジシのところへ向かっていった。クロバナを追い、ヤンサの玄水連山にいる「シロジシ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_03<tab>You are greeted by a jovial Shirojishi who wastes no time assigning Kurobana his first task. Kurobana remarks that while he is no fighter, he is certainly strong enough to carry the rice as far as the village storehouse. After watching Kurobana set off, rice sack in hand, Shirojishi bids you monitor his progress and encourage him if he tires on his way to his destination.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_03<tab>シロジシと話した。クロバナは、意気揚々と俵を担いで倉へ向かっていったが、シロジシ曰く、俵運びは想像以上にキツいものだそうだ。玄水連山の「クロバナ」を見つけ、疲れているようであれば「活を入れ」るとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_04<tab>When you catch up to Kurobana, it is evident that he is struggling under the weight of the local produce. You do your best to lift his spirits, hoping it will give him the strength for one final push. Kurobana seems to regain some of his lost stamina and embarks on the last stretch of his journey to the storehouse.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_04<tab>クロバナに活を入れた。すると、少し元気が出たようで、倉に向けて俵運びを再開した。ナマイ村にいる「クロバナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_05<tab>Kurobana triumphantly drops his rice sack thinking his work for the day is done. When Hachiboku lets him know that there are still three more sacks to be transported, the Lupin boy decides enough is enough. You prepare to go and inform Fukudo of yet another failure.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_05<tab>クロバナと話した。やりきった様子のクロバナだったが、あと3往復はしてほしいとのハチボクの話を聞くと、それはできないと音を上げてどこかへ行ってしまった。ナマイ村の「フクド」に事の顛末を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_06<tab>You find that Fukudo has already gotten a hold of Kurobana and remonstrated with the boy. The young Lupin is forced to promise that he shall not give up the next time he is faced with another challenge. Fukudo muses that Kurobana might be better suited to a job that requires little strength.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_06<tab>フクドに報告した。ちょうどフクドは、音を上げたクロバナを捕まえて話を聞いていたところだった。もう逃げ出さないと誓うクロバナ。一方フクドは、次は力のいらない仕事をやらせてみるとしようと呟くのであった。
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SEQ_08<tab>

TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_00<tab>クロバナと話す
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_01<tab>シロジシと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_02<tab>Go to Kurobana and /psych him up.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_02<tab>クロバナに「活を入れる」をする
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_03<tab>クロバナと話す
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_04<tab>フクドに報告
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_TODO_05<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_000<tab>I see you have chosen to stay and help. You have my thanks. I believe Kurobana may be best suited to work that involves heavy lifting.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_000<tab>まだ付き合ってくれるのだな、かたじけない。
手始めに、俵運びをやらせてみようかと思うのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_001<tab>As you are doubtless aware, this village's economy is entirely supported by rice farming. All harvested rice is stuffed into straw bags and carried to a nearby storehouse.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_001<tab>見てのとおり、この村は稲作で生計を立てている。
収穫した米は、稲わらで作った俵に入れて、
この近くにある倉まで運んでくるのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_002<tab>While Kurobana may not be a fighter, he is still a Lupin, and as such possesses strength greater than most men. I imagine he could put this to use by transporting rice.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_002<tab>武の才はなくとも、クロバナは人狼族だ。
人並み外れた力を持っているだろうから、
荷運びが向いているやもしれん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_003<tab>I will inform the storehouse manager, Shirojishi, of the situation. Could you discuss this with Kurobana for me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_003<tab>倉の管理を担っているシロジシという者には、
私から話をつけておくので、「クロバナ」のやつに、
この件を伝えておいてくれないだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_004<tab>I am sure your word will carry more weight with him than mine would.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_004<tab>なに、心配はいらないさ。
村の者でない、そなたが話をした方が、
あいつも聞き入れてくれるだろうしな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_005<tab>I will tell Shirojishi about Kurobana. Could you discuss my idea with the boy?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_005<tab>倉の管理を担っているシロジシという者には、
私から話をつけておくので、「クロバナ」のやつに、
この件を伝えておいてくれないだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_010<tab>Ah, I see you have not yet left Namai. I hope you have not come to ask me to fight again.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_010<tab>あぁ、旅の人か。
まだ村にいたんだな……で、まだ俺に何か用でも？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_011<tab>Fukudo wants me to try carrying rice? There he goes again meddling in the affairs of others.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_011<tab>俵運びをやってみないか、だって！？
あの人も、本当に世話焼きというか、おせっかいというか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_012<tab>That said, if it will help the village, then I can hardly refuse. I shall go and talk to Shirojishi.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_012<tab>けど、村の役に立てるなら、やらない手はないな。
わかった、「シロジシ」さんのところに行くとするよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_013<tab>It seems Fukudo has already talked to Shirojishi. Honestly, once he has a plan, he wastes no time in putting it into action.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_013<tab>いつの間にかシロジシさんに話をつけてるだなんて、
あの人も、本当に世話焼きというか、おせっかいというか……。
けど、村の役に立てるなら、やらない手はないからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_020<tab>Kurobana, good to see you! My thanks for your help as well, adventurer. Fukudo has already told me all I need to know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_020<tab>よく来たな、クロバナ！
旅の方も、わざわざすまない。
いきさつはフクドさんから、しかと聞いてるぜ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_021<tab>Let us start by having you carry this sack right here. It is a bit on the heavy side, but do you think you can handle it?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_021<tab>運んで貰いたいのは、この俵よ！
こいつを、村の倉まで運んでくれ。
結構な重さだが、やれそうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_022<tab>Do not worry, Shirojishi. I may not be much of a warrior, but I am confident in my strength!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_022<tab>戦いはともかく、力にはそれなりの自信があるよ。
ちゃちゃっと運び終えてみせるさ！
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_023<tab>おらよっと！
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_025<tab>間違っても落としたりするんじゃねぇぞ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Kurobana strides off towards the village storehouse with a spring in his step.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>クロバナは、意気揚々と俵を担いで倉へ向かっていった…。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_026<tab>I do hope he is up to the task. I have seen many a man struggle to complete their first journey to the storehouse.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_026<tab>クロバナのやつ、ちゃんと運びきれるだろうな？
あの俵、慣れてないやつが倉まで運ぶとなると、
想像以上に結構キツいもんなんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_027<tab>Pray do me a favor. If he struggles along the way, give him some encouragement on my behalf. It may seem like a test of strength, but carrying rice is ultimately a mental battle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_027<tab>旅の方や、もし道中でクロバナがへばってたりしたら、
イッパツ「活を入れ」てやってくれよ！
ああいう力仕事に必要なのは、何よりも気合だぜ、気合ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_028<tab>If he struggles along the way, give him some encouragement on my behalf. It may seem like a test of strength, but carrying rice is ultimately a mental battle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SHIROJISHI_000_028<tab>もし道中でクロバナがへばってたりしたら、
イッパツ「活を入れ」てやってくれよ！
ああいう力仕事に必要なのは、何よりも気合だぜ、気合ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_030<tab><pant> <pant> I...I did not expect the rice would be quite so heavy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_030<tab>ハァハァ……。
こ、こんなに重いとは思ってなかった……！

TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_100_030<tab>な、なんだい……？
思ってたより重いんだ……少し休ませてよ……！

TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SYSTEM_100_030<tab>クロバナにエモート「活を入れる」をして、
気合を注入しよう。

TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_031<tab>ハァハァ……。
どうもありがとう、少し元気が出たよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_032<tab>I really wonder if there is no better way rice could be transported. I have had to check multiple times that it was straw and not a knife that was cutting into my shoulder!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_032<tab>まさか、こんなに重いとは思ってなかったよ。
それに俵の稲わらが、肩に食い込むわ擦れるわで、
痛ってぇのなんの……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_033<tab>But thanks to your encouragement, I think I may just be able to make it to the storehouse.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_033<tab>だけど、励ましてくれたお陰か、元気が出たよ。
もう倉も見えてるし、運びきってみせるさ……！
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_100_023<tab>おらよっと！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Summoning the last of his strength, Kurobana once again sets off in the direction of the village storehouse.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>クロバナは、力を振り絞りながら俵を担ぎ、
再び倉へ向かっていった……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_033<tab>I had heard from Shirojishi that Kurobana was going to try his hand at this, but I never expected him to succeed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_033<tab>話は聞いてたが、クロバナのやつ、
ちゃんと俵を運びきったじゃないか！
感心、感心！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_040<tab>It took every fiber of my being, but I did it! Who knew this would be such tiring work...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_040<tab>た、大変だった……。
はたから見ていると、軽々運んでいるように見えてたけど、
こんなに疲れる仕事だとは思ってもなかったよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_041<tab>Good work, Kurobana. As you have noticed, transporting rice is not quite as easy as it looks. But given time, I am sure you too will become quite good at it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_041<tab>お疲れさん！
そりゃあお前、みんな手慣れてるから楽そうに見えるだけで、
慣れるまでは大変ってもんよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_042<tab>Now, you have had ample time for a rest. Make another three trips to and from the storehouse and your work will be done for the day.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_042<tab>ところでクロバナよ、やりきったようなツラしてるが、
まだまだ運ばないといけない俵は沢山あるんだぜ。
お前にも、あと3往復はしてほしいところなんだが？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_043<tab>Three trips!? I thought that was it... Sorry, I do not think I am suited to this after all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_043<tab>あと3往復だって！？
さすがにそれは無理だ……
お、お先に失礼するよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_044<tab>Hmph. If <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is how he responds to the slightest hardship then I do not think we will have any use for him. Pray tell Fukudo as much.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_044<tab>クロバナのやつ、あっさり音を上げやがって……！
こんなことなら、手伝いなんて、もう結構だよ。
「フクド」さんに、そう言ってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_045<tab>Tell Fukudo that we no longer require Kurobana's help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_HACHIBOKU_000_045<tab>クロバナのやつ、あっさり音を上げやがって……。
こんなことなら、手伝いなんて、もう結構だよ。
「フクド」さんに、そう言ってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_046<tab>How could anyone carry so much rice in one day?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_046<tab>あと3往復なんて、さすがに無理だ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_050<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I just caught Kurobana trying to abandon his duties.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_050<tab>走り去ろうとしていたクロバナのやつをとっ捕まえて、
ちょうど話を聞いていたところよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_051<tab>It seems he was able to carry one sack of rice, but shirked from the idea of carrying three more. Admittedly, he is not wrong to think it grueling work. I too struggled to carry even my first load of rice.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_051<tab>ひとつは運べたが、3往復と聞いてたじろいでしまった、とな。
たしかに、俵運びは慣れるまでは大変だ。
かくいう私も、始めのうちは、なかなか苦労したものよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_052<tab>However, if you continue like this, the whole village will think you a weak-willed coward!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_052<tab>……だが、途中で逃げ出すのは見逃せぬ！
そんなことでは、村の皆に根性なしだと笑われてしまうぞ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_053<tab>I am sorry, Fukudo. You have my word that I will not give up like this again.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_KUROBANA_000_053<tab>わ、悪かったよ、フクドさん。
これからは、もう途中で投げたりはしないからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_054<tab>Perhaps next time we should have you try a job that does not require great strength...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ414_02737_FUKUDO_000_054<tab>はぁ、まったく。
俵運びがダメとなると、
次は、力のいらない仕事をやらせてみるとするか……。
